page.title: 15 REDSTONE CEMETERY
page.content: {Redstone Cemetery}is the cemetery for the Reigate and Banstead area.It started in{1932}and used to be all allotments.It covers{14}acres.Mr Martin is in charge of the cemetery and there are three fulltime workers and four who come in occasionally. Their main job is to cut the grass. Roughly{200}burials a year are made.When the cemetery is full it will have{17,000}graves in it but that will be in{30}years time. The cemetery has several ledgers which list everyone buried there.The pages are made of velum.The cemetery is divided up into sections -{A to F and{G}is the war burials. All the graves must have at least {two and a half feet}between the surface and the coffin.
